description:
Data was generated from file metadata information from the GDC release 19, downloaded October 16, 2019. 
More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-190

fields.description: Program dbGaP accession number, eg phs000187
fields.name: project_dbgap_accession_number

fields.description: The type of disease studied by the project; e.g. Sarcoma,  Breast Invasive Carcinoma,Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, etc
fields.name: project_disease_type

fields.description: Project Name; frequently the same as or similar to the project disease type eg   Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia - Phase II   or   Breast Invasive Carcinoma   etc
fields.name: project_name

fields.description: Program dbGaP accession number, eg phs000178
fields.name: program_dbgap_accession_number

fields.description: Program name, eg TCGA or TARGET
fields.name: program_name

fields.description: ID of the Project -- e.g. TCGA-BRCA, TARGET-AML, etc
fields.name: project_id

fields.description: Submitter identifier, eg HCC1954, TCGA-ZX-AA5X, etc
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Total number of files for this case in the GDC legacy archive
fields.name: legacy_file_count

fields.description: Total number of files for this case in the active (default) GDC archive
fields.name: active_file_count
